attributes.action: help put Radio Cardiff back on the air.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Radio Cardiff which is a great community project was recently forced to stop broadcasting due to the insuffiicent funding and lack of support from the Welsh Assembly.  Due to this positive community project being suspended the youth of the area and the community are missing out on opportunities and training.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
